ui.title: Social & Mental Health Services
ui.subtitle: Immediate access iti non-law-enforcement professional support. Dagitoy a resources ket para iti safety ken care-mo.
ui.takedown_promo: Masapulmo kadi ti tulong iti formal takedown request?

intouch.name: InTouch Community Services
intouch.description: Quality mental health services karaman ti counseling, support groups, ken professional training.

dswd.name: Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD)
dswd.description: Crisis centers ken 24/7 hotlines para kadagiti victims ti violence ken dagiti adda iti krisis.

lunas.name: Lunas Collective
lunas.description: Maysa a volunteer-powered care space para kadagiti babbai ken members/allies ti LGBTQIA+ community nga nakapadas ti gender-based violence wenno addaan sexual ken reproductive health concerns.
lunas.note: Specifically for women and LGBTQIA+ community.

bantay_bata.name: Bantay Bata Helpline 163
bantay_bata.description: Sumungbat kadagiti reports ti child abuse, exploitation, ken neglect, ken i-connect-na dagiti callers iti appropriate agencies.
bantay_bata.note: Specialized for child abuse and exploitation.

ncmh.name: National Center for Mental Health (NCMH) Crisis Line
ncmh.description: 24/7 crisis hotline nga mangted ti mental health support ken intervention services.

tawag_paglaum.name: Tawag Paglaum - Centro Bisaya
tawag_paglaum.description: Maysa a 24-hour call-based mental health helpline nga mangted serbisyo iti English ken Filipino.

rapha.name: Rapha Helpline
rapha.description: Maysa a safe world para kadagiti ubbing a nawaya manipud sexual abuse ken exploitation. Free online mental health support services.
